name: 3rd Workshop on Road Traffic Monitoring
tagline: Master in Computer Vision Barcelona (4 February 2016)
body:
This workshop includes the final project presentation in the Module 4 "Video Analysis" of the [Master in Computer Vision Barcelona](http://pagines.uab.cat/mcv/). This module is organized by the [Image Processing Group](https://imatge.upc.edu/web/) at the Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya.

Each team has set up a project page where you can access their final report, slides, as well as all source code used during the module.

| Team ID        | Students      | Project page  | Paper  | Slides |
| :------------: |:-------------:| :------------:|:------:|
| 1      | X | URL | PDF | GDocs |

* Team 1
* Team 2
* Team 3
* Team 4
* Team 5
* Team 6
* Team 7
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
